claim: Victor Hugo was a screenplay writer.
premise_source_doc_sentence: , Malayalam screenplay writer M. T. Vasudevan Nair holds the record of winning maximum awards in category with four wins for the films : Kadavu  (  1991  )  , Sadayam  (  1992  )  , Parinayam  (  1994  )  , and Karunam  (  1999  )  .
